description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Brace yourself for a massive onslaught of evil avatars. Take on the horde alone or get help with the online CO-OP mode. Level your character and compete against the world with global scoreboards. See you on the battlefield!
description.short: Brace yourself for a massive onslaught of evil avatars. Take on the horde alone or get help with the online CO-OP mode. Level your character and compete against the world with global scoreboards. See you on the battlefield!
